name: Dark Magician
description:
Dark Magician is a 2d platform game with the story of a protagonist who has his disciple kidnapped by a dark magician.
The game consists of the search for your apprentice, traveling through different environments facing numerous enemies and traps.

Game possibilities:

- Collect coins to improve: spells, unlock new spell space (so you can use more than one spell during battle).
- Collect gems to exchange for gold in the shop.
- All spells will be available, it's up to you to decide which will be better in each battle.
- The improvement of spells will be traded with gold, but with the collection of 60 gems you can exchange it for 1000 gold. (Advantage)
Game Dark Magician is the first development of the team Guaxinim Studio, which currently has only one programmer and one designer.
